code: import React,{useState}from"react";import API from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Search(){const[code,setCode]=useState("");const[cert,setCert]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const searchCode=async()=>{try{const res=await API.get(`/search/point/${code}`);setResult({type:"point",data:res.data});}catch(e){alert("Não encontrado");}};const searchCert=async()=>{try{const res=await API.get(`/search/certification/${cert}`);setResult({type:"cert",data:res.data});}catch(e){alert("Não encontrado");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:10},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Buscar ponto (ex: D5Y-M-0001)",value:code,onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:searchCode,children:"Buscar ponto"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:10},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Buscar certifica\xE7\xE3o (ID)",value:cert,onChange:e=>setCert(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:searchCert,children:"Buscar certifica\xE7\xE3o"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:10,border:"1px solid #ddd",padding:10},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(result,null,2)})})]});}
